abstract: The alliance seeks to build on the results of an experimental treatment that trains a person’s immune system to kill cancer cells.
snippet: The alliance seeks to build on the results of an experimental treatment that trains a person’s immune system to kill cancer cells.
lead_paragraph: The drugmaker Novartis and the University of Pennsylvania announced a research and licensing agreement early Monday that aims to bring to market a new approach to fighting cancer that has shown promising results in early trials.

headline.main: Novartis and Penn Unite on New Anticancer Path
headline.print_headline: Novartis and Penn Unite On New Anticancer Path
